message: Module error while trying to scrape and log external temperature: failed to interact with node 'system' via get: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='kazanfutes-71b78-default-rtdb.europe-west1.firebasedatabase.app', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /system/.json (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0xf53b1190>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 101] Network is unreachable')) (ConnectionError).
